Merging this PR will trigger a full Docker build with:
- Smoke tests (Claude, Gemini, Codex, Python stack, Snakemake)
- Trivy security scan (CRITICAL/HIGH reported to Security tab)
- Multi-arch push to Docker Hub (`linux/amd64`, `linux/arm64`)
- Tags: `:latest`, `:claude-NEW_CLAUDE`, `:DATE_TAG`
- GitHub Release with pinned pull commands
